about.title: Hi, I’m <0>Vinícius</0>
about.p1: A passionate full-stack software developer dedicated to creating modern and efficient web applications. I enjoy turning ideas into functional and scalable products by combining best engineering practices with a focus on user experience.
about.p2: I am currently working as a software development intern, contributing to projects involving API integrations, automation, and cloud solutions.
